channel.title: using Arm in Gateway
channel.description:
Does using `arm` (and pressing n two times) in Gateway as same as the New Identity function in normal Tor Browser Bundle?
As far as I know there are "new circuit" and "new identity". The new circuit just gives a new IP while a new identity is like new circuit plus clearing all browser history and cookies. The new identity button is removed in Whonix's TBB. So I wonder how to get a new identity in Whonix.
